header.title: wxTaskBarIconEvent

description.p: The event class used by wxTaskBarIcon. For a list of the event macros meant to be used with wxTaskBarIconEvent, please look at wxTaskBarIcon description.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxEvent
